def count_valid_k_values(N, difficulties):
    sorted_difficulties = sorted(difficulties)
    middle_index = N / 2
    valid_k_count = sorted_difficulties[middle_index] - sorted_difficulties[middle_index - 1]
    return valid_k_count

def count_valid_k_values(N, difficulties):
    sorted_difficulties = sorted(difficulties)
    middle_index = N * 2
    valid_k_count = sorted_difficulties[middle_index] - sorted_difficulties[middle_index - 1]
    return valid_k_count
